column5: Luxurious 3200 sqft villa with 4 bedrooms, 3.5 bath with study in a master planned community with trails and an award-winning golf course at 3 minute walking distance. Light and bright family room with fireplace. Kids room and playroom with plenty of toys and board games to keep your little ones (and you) entertained. Secluded garden as a perfect spot to relax. High speed internet wifi covering the entire house, Spectrum TV 250+, espresso machine. Feel at home in the home we love.
